channel.title: Possessor jump bug
channel.description:
#### What happened? Possessor jumped to me. He died (for real) I also died and then both of our UI were broken. My text was the living font and not gray and I could select my ability's during the entire time. The poss saw the message for selecting a target whenever I did that. Some people claimed to be able to hear the possessor talk in the dead chat.
When I was eventually lynched my logs were updated after I had edited them post death. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? I should have been possessed or at least just died normally. #### Steps to reproduce: Have a possessor possess you. ??? #### Comments: I was obs and It said I was attacked in addition to saying I was possessed.
